code: import React from"react";import{Badge}from"react-bootstrap";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var StatusBadge=function StatusBadge(props){var text=props.text;function getColourofBadge(){if(text==="Completed")return"success";else if(text==="Needs Update")return"danger";else if(text==="Pending Submission")return"warning";else if(text==="Resubmitted")return"primary";else return"info";}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Badge,{pill:true,bg:getColourofBadge(),style:{fontSize:"1em"},children:text});};export default StatusBadge;
